title: Looking For a "Team" of people who play regularly and are keen for banter!
body:
Just looking for a group of people who are keen to play some league together regularly. Preferably 16-17+ and from bronze III to gold I. 

Post if interested and add me In Game
IGN: BearKind

Send Me a message in game Once i accept friend request

replies.body:
>16-17+

This is the world we live in.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=JmQ8kFeE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-31T07:25:33.626+0000)

> This is the world we live in.

yeah xD
